definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)

sentences.english: Rosin modified nonylphenol resin is used as the linking mater ial in printing-inks.
sentences.chinese: 松香改性壬基酚醛樹脂用於油墨連結料。

sentences.english: A preparation methods of phenolic molding material with low chloric ion is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 論文敘述了一種低氯離子含量酚醛模塑料的製備方法。

sentences.english: The effect of thermoplastic phenolic resin and sand on performance of resin coated sand was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了熱塑性酚醛樹脂和原砂對覆膜砂性能的影響。

sentences.english: This article recommends manufacture and application of the novolacs resin modified by tung oil.
sentences.chinese: 介紹桐油改性線型酚醛樹脂的製造方法及應用研究。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the preparation method and the application of the sepiolite fibre reinforced phenolic resin-based composite.
sentences.chinese: 介紹海泡石纖維增強酚醛複合材料的製備方法和應用。

sentences.english: The optimum technological conditions of nonyl phenolic resin modified by rosin have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了壬基酚松香改性酚醛樹脂的工藝條件。

sentences.english: A modified Formaldehyde is developed and it is a water dissolve modified thermosetting Phenol Formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 所研製的樹脂膠是一種水溶性改性熱固酚醛樹脂膠。

sentences.english: The synthesized rosin modified phenolic resin had good performance of self-gelling.
sentences.chinese: 合成的改性松香酚醛樹脂具有良好的自凝性。

sentences.english: Rosin modified nonylphenolic resin was synthesized by one - step synthesis in laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室內用一步法合成了松香改性壬基酚醛樹脂。

sentences.english: PPO catalyzes the initial step in the polymerization of phenolics to produce quinones .
sentences.chinese: 多酚氧化酶能加快酚醛塑料的聚合，產生苯醌。

sentences.english: The oil-pan gasket fits between the oil pan and bottom pf the engine block.
sentences.chinese: 石油潘墊片一刀切之間油底殼和底部酚醛引擎座。

sentences.english: So how might phenolics prevent heart disease?
sentences.chinese: 那麼酚醛物質是怎麼預防心臟病的呢？

sentences.english: The synthesis of "high ortho "novolak resin has been presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了高鄰位熱塑性酚醛樹脂的合成試驗。

sentences.english: We describe here the synthesis and characterization of high ortho-positionphenol-formaldehyde resin ether.
sentences.chinese: 報道了高鄰位酚醛樹脂酸的合成和表徵。

sentences.english: The phase behavior and compatibility of thermoplastics modified phenolic resins are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了熱塑性樹脂增韌酚醛樹脂的相容性和相行爲。

sentences.english: The thermoset phenolic resin with high char yield has been synthesized with Naphthol, phenol and formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 以萘酚部分替代苯酚合成了高殘炭熱固性酚醛樹脂。
